text: “Chaar saal me kabhi mai Dishaa se baat nahi karunga” XD. Yeah, well, life is ironic, isn’t it? Sometimes the most unexpected things in life are the best, and I found my best with you. I’ll thank rum and the lack of specs for introducing this amazing friend to me, a friend who has been the craziest celebrator of my success and the most comforting shoulder to cry on. I can never forget kaise tune mujhe ESC201 ke exam ke ek din pehle 14 ghante forcefully padaya tha. Thanks to you, I passed the course and somehow tere se zyada marks aa gaye. Hehe XD. I could only wish to have met you sooner, logo ko judge karna thoda jaldi seekh jata, an essential skill I lacked before :p (still learning tho). Please learn to walk straight and always do cute and clumsy harkate. From late-night walks on campus to driving around on scooty in Bangalore and Goa, this ride has been amazing by your side, and I wish to get the opportunity to hold your hands in the future as well. Take care, Biryani Monster. Stay smart, strong, and silly always. See you, Love you, Faizan
author: Faizan  Siddiqui

text: To the future millionaire YouTuber who will buy penthouses for all his friends XD. I still remember the first-year Galaxy when the HEC introduced me to the hall ki jaan, and everyone was like, "tum Ramola ko kaise nahi jaante". You are an amazing person with a heart of gold, and not a lot of people manage to have such a charismatic personality with a humble nature like yours. Stay the way you are always, and keep making amazing videos. Your fan, Faizan <3
author: Faizan  Siddiqui
